about_the_game:
Game Description

Garden Ink is a game, in which you bring an empty world to life. You plant biomes that you can choose freely, and each area offers new content and secrets to discover.

Gameplay

By solving minigames and puzzles, you unlock new biomes and decorative elements. With these, you can gradually beautify your world. Your goal is to create a flourishing and beautiful environment. The gameplay gives you a top-down view of your world. You can directly interact with it and unlock various tools. With these tools, you can paint plants, replant them, or combine decorative elements. This opens up countless possibilities to design your world in a unique way.

Atmosphere

Everything is accompanied by a relaxing soundtrack, cute sounds from the creatures, and harmonious visuals. Garden Ink invites you to play at your own pace and create a cozy little world that is entirely your own.

name: Garden Ink

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 11 / Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or better; 256 MB or higher
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Lion (OSX 10.7.X)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia or ATI graphics card
  • Storage: 3 MB available space

short_description: In Garden Ink, you start with a blank world and two seeds. They will grow into a cute world filled with fun minigames and puzzles. You will even be able to replace, color and merge many of the objects!
